alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:23PM CDT until March 31 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LITTLE RIVER...NORTHERN HEMPSTEAD...SOUTHEASTERN SEVIER...SOUTHEASTERN HOWARD AND NORTHERN NEVADA COUNTIES... At 322 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saratoga, or 7 miles northeast of Ashdown, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashdown, Nashville, Prescott, Mineral Springs, Wilton, Blevins, Tollette, Washington, Saratoga, McCaskill, Ozan, Bright Star, Boughton and Millwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier
